description: Keep your bikes and your truck scratch free when you get shuttle duty. This well-padded tailgate protector has attachment points for up to 6 bikes. Quick-access tailgate release makes set up and take down quick and easy.Made of heavy nylon that's cut and water resistant.Attachment points for up to 6 bikes.Padding protects both the truck and the bikes from scratches and damage.Quick-access tailgate release is quick to set up and tear down.Fold-away flap for rear camera.Size 136cm: fits a tailgate 132cm+ wide (inside) and 50cm+ high (outside).Size 160cm: fits a tailgate 156cm+ wide (inside) and 58cm+ high (outside).
name: EVOC TailGate Pad
